heroBanner.title: CHOOSE A WALLET THAT SUITS YOU
heroBanner.subtitle: Bitfate Wallets
heroBanner.desc: Gain access to the DeFi landscape through non-custodial wallets designed for a multitude of requirements.

dailyUseSection.title: Daily access to Bitfate
dailyUseSection.subtitle: These wallets provide lightweight, easy access to Bitfateâ€™s suite of features. Best suited for users who interact with Blockchain on a near-daily basis, while not compromising on speed and security of funds.

DFC.title: DeFi Wallet
DFC.desc: Lightweight, instant access to Bitfate's Decentralized Finance at your fingertips.

JLY.title: Extension
JLY.desc: The ultimate non-custodial multichain browser wallet, allowing seamless access to the exciting world of DeFi and Web3.

advanceUseSection.title: Advanced usage of Bitfate
advanceUseSection.subtitle: Advanced wallets that are suited for complex usage of  Bitfate, such as node and multi-signature management along with much more.

DFC.title: Desktop Full-Node Wallet
DFC.desc: Transact, liquidity mine, swap and more with the full-featured and fully-decentralized wallet app. Full node included.

RPI.title: Wallet for Raspberry Pi
RPI.desc: A version of the desktop wallet for Raspberry Pi 4B 4GB with official Raspberry Pi OS (32-Bit).

CLI.title: CLI
CLI.desc: Transact and interact with Bitfate through a command line interface. Full node included.

DFIElectrum.title: Bitfate Electrum
DFIElectrum.desc: Multi-signature Bitfate wallet built with Electrum for treasury use cases and more.

QUANTUM.title: Bridge
QUANTUM.desc: Trusted bridge that facilitates seamless transfers between Blockchains.
